content: these mats are perfect for anywhere around the house made using uk treble/us double_crochet and chain stitches there are clearly written instructions and lots and lots of lovingly photographed diagrams meaning that it is relatively simple to complete hence the name i will be using mine for plants and other pretty ornaments 5 page photo tutorial **intermediate level** **© teri hamilton crochet@teri s 2023 this pattern is my original pattern by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use please do not claim this pattern as your own you may not sell or distribute the pattern or any part thereof without prior permission it is permitted to make items from this pattern provided they meet safety guidelines and crochet at teri s is accredited **
